trans-unit.source: LINQ to XML for XPath Users (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: LINQ to XML 针对 XPath 用户 (Visual Basic 中) |Microsoft 文档

trans-unit.source: LINQ to XML for XPath Users (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: LINQ to XML 针对 XPath 用户 (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: This set of topics show a number of XPath expressions and their [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] equivalents.
trans-unit.target: 这组主题演示很多 XPath 表达式及其 [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] 等效表达式。

trans-unit.source: All of the examples use the XPath functionality in [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] that is made available by the extension methods in <xref:System.Xml.XPath.Extensions?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 所有示例都使用中的 XPath 功能[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)]，可供<xref:System.Xml.XPath.Extensions?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.Extensions?displayProperty=fullName>中的扩展方法

trans-unit.source: The examples execute both the XPath expression and the [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] expression.
trans-unit.target: 这些示例既执行 XPath 表达式也执行 [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] 表达式。

trans-unit.source: Each example then compares the results of both queries, validating that the XPath expression is functionally equivalent to the [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] query.
trans-unit.target: 然后，每个示例都对这两种查询的结果进行比较，验证 XPath 表达式与 [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] 查询的功能等效性。

trans-unit.source: As both types of queries return nodes from the same XML tree, the query result comparison is made using referential identity.
trans-unit.target: 由于这两种类型的查询都从相同的 XML 树返回节点，因此查询结果的比较是使用引用标识进行的。

trans-unit.source: In This Section
trans-unit.target: 本节内容

trans-unit.source: Topic
trans-unit.target: 主题

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: [Comparison of XPath and LINQ to XML](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/comparison-of-xpath-and-linq-to-xml.md)
trans-unit.target: [XPath 和 LINQ to XML 的比较](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/comparison-of-xpath-and-linq-to-xml.md)

trans-unit.source: Provides an overview of the similarities and differences between XPath and [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 概述 XPath 和 [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] 的异同。

trans-unit.source: [How to: Find a Child Element (XPath-LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-a-child-element-xpath-linq-to-xml.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何︰ 查找子元素 (XPATH-LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-a-child-element-xpath-linq-to-xml.md)

trans-unit.source: Compares the XPath child element axis to the [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.Element%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 比较 XPath 子元素轴与[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)]<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.Element%2A>方法。</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.Element%2A>

trans-unit.source: The associated XPath expression is:`"DeliveryNotes"`.
trans-unit.target: 关联的 XPath 表达式为：`"DeliveryNotes"`。

trans-unit.source: [How to: Find a List of Child Elements (XPath-LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-a-list-of-child-elements-xpath-linq-to-xml.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何︰ 查找子元素 (XPATH-LINQ to XML) 的列表 (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-a-list-of-child-elements-xpath-linq-to-xml.md)

trans-unit.source: Compares the XPath child elements axis to the [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.Elements%2A> axis.
trans-unit.target: 比较 XPath 子元素轴与[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)]<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.Elements%2A>轴。</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XContainer.Elements%2A>

trans-unit.source: The associated XPath expression is:`"./*"`
trans-unit.target: 关联的 XPath 表达式为：`"./*"`

trans-unit.source: [How to: Find the Root Element (XPath-LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-the-root-element-xpath-linq-to-xml.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何︰ 查找根元素 (XPATH-LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-the-root-element-xpath-linq-to-xml.md)

trans-unit.source: Compares how to get the root element with XPath and [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 比较如何使用 XPath 和 [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] 获取根元素。

trans-unit.source: The associated XPath expression is:`"/PurchaseOrders"`
trans-unit.target: 关联的 XPath 表达式为：`"/PurchaseOrders"`

trans-unit.source: [How to: Find Descendant Elements (XPath-LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-descendant-elements-xpath-linq-to-xml.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何︰ 查找子代元素 (XPATH-LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-descendant-elements-xpath-linq-to-xml.md)

trans-unit.source: Compares how to get the descendant elements with a particular name with XPath and [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 比较如何使用 XPath 和 [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] 获取具有特定名称的子代元素。

trans-unit.source: The associated XPath expression is:`"//Name"`
trans-unit.target: 关联的 XPath 表达式为：`"//Name"`

trans-unit.source: [How to: Filter on an Attribute (XPath-LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-filter-on-an-attribute-xpath-linq-to-xml.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何︰ 筛选特性 (XPATH-LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-filter-on-an-attribute-xpath-linq-to-xml.md)

trans-unit.source: Compares how to get the descendant elements with a specified name, and with an attribute with a specified value with XPath and [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 比较如何使用 XPath 和 [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] 获取子代元素，这些子代元素具有指定的名称，并具有一个带指定值的属性。

trans-unit.source: The associated XPath expression is:`".//Address[@Type='Shipping']"`
trans-unit.target: 关联的 XPath 表达式为：`".//Address[@Type='Shipping']"`

trans-unit.source: [How to: Find Related Elements (XPath-LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-related-elements-xpath-linq-to-xml.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何︰ 查找相关的元素 (XPATH-LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-related-elements-xpath-linq-to-xml.md)

trans-unit.source: Compares how to get an element selecting on an attribute that is referred to by the value of another element with XPath and [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 比较如何使用 XPath 和 [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] 在由其他元素的值所引用的属性上获取元素选择。

trans-unit.source: The associated XPath expression is:`".//Customer[@CustomerID=/Root/Orders/Order[12]/CustomerID]"`
trans-unit.target: 关联的 XPath 表达式为：`".//Customer[@CustomerID=/Root/Orders/Order[12]/CustomerID]"`

trans-unit.source: [How to: Find Elements in a Namespace (XPath-LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-elements-in-a-namespace.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何︰ 查找 Namespace (XPATH-LINQ to XML) 中的元素 (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-elements-in-a-namespace.md)

trans-unit.source: Compares the use of the XPath <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> class with the [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XName.Namespace%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XName> class for working with XML namespaces.
trans-unit.target: 比较 XPath 使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>类[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)]<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XName.Namespace%2A>属性<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XName>类中的用于处理 XML 命名空间。</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XName> </xref:System.Xml.Linq.XName.Namespace%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>

trans-unit.source: The associated XPath expression is:`"./aw:*"`
trans-unit.target: 关联的 XPath 表达式为：`"./aw:*"`

trans-unit.source: [How to: Find Preceding Siblings (XPath-LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-preceding-siblings-xpath-linq-to-xml.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何︰ 查找前面的同级 (XPATH-LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-preceding-siblings-xpath-linq-to-xml.md)

trans-unit.source: Compares the XPath `preceding-sibling` axis to the [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] child <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNode.ElementsBeforeSelf%2A?displayProperty=fullName> axis.
trans-unit.target: 比较 XPath`preceding-sibling`轴与[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)]子<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNode.ElementsBeforeSelf%2A?displayProperty=fullName>轴。</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNode.ElementsBeforeSelf%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The associated XPath expression is:`"preceding-sibling::*"`
trans-unit.target: 关联的 XPath 表达式为：`"preceding-sibling::*"`

trans-unit.source: [How to: Find Descendants of a Child Element (XPath-LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-descendants-of-a-child-element-xpath-linq-to-xml.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何︰ 查找子元素 (XPATH-LINQ to XML) 的子代 (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-descendants-of-a-child-element-xpath-linq-to-xml.md)

trans-unit.source: Compares how to get the descendant elements of a child element with a particular name with XPath and [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 比较如何使用 XPath 和 [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] 获取具有特定名称的子元素的子代元素。

trans-unit.source: The associated XPath expression is:`"./Paragraph//Text/text()"`
trans-unit.target: 关联的 XPath 表达式为：`"./Paragraph//Text/text()"`

trans-unit.source: [How to: Find a Union of Two Location Paths (XPath-LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-a-union-of-two-location-paths-xpath.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何︰ 查找两个位置路径 (XPATH-LINQ to XML) 的并集 (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-a-union-of-two-location-paths-xpath.md)

trans-unit.source: Compares the use of the union operator, `|`, in XPath with the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Concat%2A> standard query operator in [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 比较使用 union 运算符， `|`，与 XPath 中<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Concat%2A>中的标准查询运算符[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)]。</xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.Concat%2A>

trans-unit.source: The associated XPath expression is:`"//Category|//Price"`
trans-unit.target: 关联的 XPath 表达式为：`"//Category|//Price"`

trans-unit.source: [How to: Find Sibling Nodes (XPath-LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-sibling-nodes-xpath-linq-to-xml.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何︰ 查找同级节点 (XPATH-LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-sibling-nodes-xpath-linq-to-xml.md)

trans-unit.source: Compares how to find all siblings of a node that have a specific name with XPath and [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 比较如何使用 XPath 和 [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] 查找所有具有特定名称的节点同级。

trans-unit.source: The associated XPath expression is:`"../Book"`
trans-unit.target: 关联的 XPath 表达式为：`"../Book"`

trans-unit.source: [How to: Find an Attribute of the Parent (XPath-LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-an-attribute-of-the-parent-xpath-linq-to-xml.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何︰ 查找父级 (XPATH-LINQ to XML) 的属性 (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-an-attribute-of-the-parent-xpath-linq-to-xml.md)

trans-unit.source: Compares how to navigate to the parent element and find an associated attribute using XPath and [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 比较如何使用 XPath 和 [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] 定位到父元素并查找关联的属性。

trans-unit.source: The associated XPath expression is:`"../@id"`
trans-unit.target: 关联的 XPath 表达式为：`"../@id"`

trans-unit.source: [How to: Find Attributes of Siblings with a Specific Name (XPath-LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-attributes-of-siblings-with-a-specific-name.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何︰ 查找具有特定名称 (XPATH-LINQ to XML) 的同级的特性 (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-attributes-of-siblings-with-a-specific-name.md)

trans-unit.source: Compares how to find specific attributes of the siblings of the context node with XPath and [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 比较如何使用 XPath 和 [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] 查找上下文节点的同级的特定属性。

trans-unit.source: The associated XPath expression is:`"``../Book/@id``"`
trans-unit.target: 关联的 XPath 表达式为：`"``../Book/@id``"`

trans-unit.source: [How to: Find Elements with a Specific Attribute (XPath-LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-elements-with-a-specific-attribute.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何︰ 查找具有特定特性 (XPATH-LINQ to XML) 的元素 (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-elements-with-a-specific-attribute.md)

trans-unit.source: Compares how to find al elements containing a specific attribute using XPath and [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 比较如何使用 XPath 和 [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] 查找所有包含特定属性的元素。

trans-unit.source: The associated XPath expression is:`"./*[@Select]"`
trans-unit.target: 关联的 XPath 表达式为：`"./*[@Select]"`

trans-unit.source: [How to: Find Child Elements Based on Position (XPath-LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-child-elements-based-on-position.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何︰ 查找子元素 (XPATH-LINQ to XML) 的位置对基于 (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-child-elements-based-on-position.md)

trans-unit.source: Compares how to find an element based on its relative position using XPath and [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 比较如何使用 XPath 和 [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] 根据元素的相对位置查找元素。

trans-unit.source: The associated XPath expression is:`"Test[position() >= 2 and position() <= 4]"`
trans-unit.target: 关联的 XPath 表达式为：`"Test[position() >= 2 and position() <= 4]"`

trans-unit.source: [How to: Find the Immediate Preceding Sibling (XPath-LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-the-immediate-preceding-sibling-xpath-linq-to-xml.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何︰ 查找前面紧邻的同级 (XPATH-LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-find-the-immediate-preceding-sibling-xpath-linq-to-xml.md)

trans-unit.source: Compares how to find the immediate preceding sibling of a node using XPath and [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 比较如何使用 XPath 和 [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] 查找节点前面紧邻的同级。

trans-unit.source: The associated XPath expression is:`"preceding-sibling::*[1]"`
trans-unit.target: 关联的 XPath 表达式为：`"preceding-sibling::*[1]"`

trans-unit.target: [使用 XPath 数据模型处理 XML 数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/536c6fce-1453-4654-9c72-bca54d47e081)
